description: Three bacon egg muffins on a white plate with a silver fork

content: "Preheat the oven to 350 degrees and generously grease a muffin tin with butter. Make sure to prepare the tin thoroughly to avoid sticking."

description: Bacon being cooked for the muffins

content: "In a medium bowl, whisk together eggs, milk, cooked and crumbled bacon, green onions, 1 cup of cheese, onion powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper. Set aside this flavorful mixture."

description: Pouring the egg mixture into the muffin tin

content: "Pour the egg mixture into the muffin tin, filling each cavity 3/4 full. Sprinkle the remaining 1/2 cup of cheddar cheese on top before baking."

description: Bacon egg muffins baking in the oven

content: "Bake the muffins for 15-20 minutes until they are set. These muffins will puff up while cooking and deflate once cooled."
"Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for 2-3 minutes, then remove and serve immediately. Enjoy these low-carb, high-protein flavor bombs for breakfast or snack!"
